website_summaries.verdict: A quality choice for someone interested in raising reptiles.
pros: The screen is sturdy but lightweight
We love how the bottom slips out for easy cleaning
While it's a quality choice for reptiles, the Zoo Med ReptiBreeze would work well for butterflies, too
It makes an excellent environment for raising baby reptiles
cons: Assembly was confusing and decorative items were not included

customer_reviews.title: Great habitat for rescued anole lizard
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful cage for my anole. I live in Florida and rescued Larry from my Yorkie mix who attacked him in our lanai. He lost his eyes in the attack (poor guy), but he's now a spoiled lizard living a life of luxury (and safety). This cage is wonderful because with the addition of plants and driftwood, it's like his own personal lanai where he can relax without a care and still be outside.
customer_reviews.author: LLD

customer_reviews.title: Great for raising butterflies
customer_reviews.text: Perfect habitat for raising Monarch butterflies! Easy to assemble and easy to clean so far!
customer_reviews.author: twdf1

customer_reviews.title: Bare Bones Screened Cage
customer_reviews.text: The cage came with all the parts and they assembled easily. The construction is not as rigid as I would have liked and I would like it if Zoo Med offered replacement parts for some of the key elements. I have 3 cages, extra large, large, and small and I bought an extra cage to cannibalize for spare parts. A major flaw is the lack of any hooks or braces from which to hang vegetation, drippers, and other accessories. You get a bare bones screened cage and have to use your ingenuity to finish it and make it functiona.l
customer_reviews.author: DOC

customer_reviews.title: Not bad buy kinda flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Kinda flimsy and not very strong screen or plastic framing but very easy to put together and my chomoeloen loves it and has been doing circles all day around it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hinefelt

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cameleons
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a glass cage 4 days later I dont recommend this for cameleon which need head in cage and very high humidity if you use ac it wont work
customer_reviews.author: LoverOfAll

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped in it's original packaging and it must have taken a hit during shipping. It was dented and one of the latched were busted off but I needed to use it so I rigged it to work for my purpose. But it does make a very nice butterfly cage.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ezbitski

customer_reviews.title: New use for Reptibreeze
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our monarch butterfly larvae and crysalids. It is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Krupper

customer_reviews.title: It's lightweight and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight and easy to clean. I needed an extra set of hands while putting it together, but otherwise was easy to do. Good size for a growing veiled chameleon.
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for small reptile or for travel
customer_reviews.text: I got this smaller one for travel w/our Panther chameleon after I got the bigger one. Just as easy to put together & love it.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Cakes

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for baby chameleon!
customer_reviews.text: Great cage. The screen is fairly strong for a small lizard. This is the perfect size for a young chameleon. The bottom does not have a screen just a square plastic that slips in and out for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: melissa garcia

customer_reviews.title: The best brand to buy for a chameleon
customer_reviews.text: The best brand to buy for a chameleon. This size is perfect for a starter/baby. Then move up to the 4ft tall one for young adults! We have 4 total (different sizes) and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage it was perfect for my baby chameleon!
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Rae

customer_reviews.title: its ok.
customer_reviews.text: i used this cage for over 4month, and it did ok job for me some parts of nylon part of the cage got ripped off but really, it does its job. by the way, you dont wanna buy a 16x16x20 inch cage for chameleon because cham is gonna grow really fast in few months and you will need at least twice bigger than this cage. (32x32x40)
customer_reviews.author: june

customer_reviews.title: Reptribreeze
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect cage for my spider. I was looking for an all screen cage and this was it. It was also a great price compared to the stores. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tigerduca

customer_reviews.title: good cage
customer_reviews.text: Great cage easy to put together. My veiled likes this enclosure a lot. My only complaint is I wish it had a good place to clip my lamps to. But its gonna last awhile while my little guy grows before I need to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Vanisher187

customer_reviews.title: The best reptile cage I've come across
customer_reviews.text: I love the door, it makes it so easy to access the animal inside. The hard bottom is easy to clean and removable. The door fastens easily and securely. The material does not rust. If they made one large enough for my Panther Chameleon as an adult, I would buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was quick. We used it on vacation for our bearded dragon and he loved sitting outside in the sunshine and fresh air in it.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: best inclosure to buy
customer_reviews.text: it woks so well and is so quick to put together, it holds up really well to the decorations and the geckos themselves which is really great, also great if you have to travel and need quick setup
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sorrow

customer_reviews.title: Chameleon habitat
customer_reviews.text: A good buy but has one flaw, the doors when closed still have a gap that small feeder worms and insects can escape through.
customer_reviews.author: J Oswalt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Zoomed product, enough said. Currently have 21 of various sizes. They last.

customer_reviews.title: Everithing looks great, perfect little habitat
customer_reviews.text: Everithing looks great,perfect little habitat,only problem was that it arrived with a broken latch on the bottom swing door.. I can't find contact info,only return option. Wish I could get that missing piece...
customer_reviews.author: Orsolya S.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived looking like Godzilla stepped on it
customer_reviews.text: IM sure if this arrived not destroyed I would like it. But it came to my door beaten, I opened the box and all the sides were cut open.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived with a part missing because it was broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a part missing because it was broken off and also had bent pieces as well. I had to return the product bc of the damage making it unable to be assesmbled but I ended up finding the same cage cheaper at my local reptile shop.
customer_reviews.author: Briana G.

customer_reviews.title: Great cages! I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for my crested geckos. They love them! Easy to clean and assemble and it's a great size. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great small cage
customer_reviews.text: Used this cage for my chameleon and also my sisters at first. Then it became strictly her chameleon's cage since you have to separate them from eachother.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It's nice.
customer_reviews.text: Four stars only because it arrived with a small hole in the screen, but nothing that will affect what I'm keeping.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for anyone raising reptiles . Great product !
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN O.

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Good quality. My chameleon love it! Good size too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter cage or travel size for me.
customer_reviews.text: We use these for baby Chameleons we breed. Nice starter cage when small or to take our big boys to the vet. Always fast shipping with Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: BMB

customer_reviews.title: Slight Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Well built but slight gaps that live food for your critter, i.e., crickets can escape. Had to use "Retile Cage Carpet" to cover them.
customer_reviews.author: Booley

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The cage did what it was suppose to do very good price too at pet stores it was way more expensive
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Crested Gecko cage for a high humidity area.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida, and this is an easy to put together - solid cage (I have one gecko that's lived in his for five years - no issues). Easy to clean, and FRESH air for your Crestie. Don't forget - spray twice a day to keep humidity up. :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Kromrie

customer_reviews.title: Good cage!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the product. Minus one star for the very late shipment. Two days late after I had paid for overnight delivery. The product itself is amazing. Strong and very, very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Can't get any easier
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. If you are using dirt or composite, it will most likely fall of the sides, front and back if you have palyfull pets like my daughter's lizards. It would be nice if the manufacturer would include covers for all sides. I am trying to come up with an easy solution for this at the moment. Carefull when buying the light! It must be the same width or it will be resting on the mesh on top.
customer_reviews.author: D. Priede

customer_reviews.title: reptibreeze
customer_reviews.text: ordered two of them for chameleons, arrived fine, one plastic piece broke off when assembling near bottom swinging tray but still usuable.Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made...usable but barely. I wouldn't recommend this cage. If it get knocked over, I'm sure it's falling apart. Plastic and screen is all it is. I could make this for a few bucks if I put my mind to it. The removable bottom is nothing more than plastic coated foam core board and will be trash after a little moisture exposure I'm betting. Way over priced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Dafoe

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Nice to open window by him for a bit of sun and fresh air.
customer_reviews.text: Great screen cage for a gecko leopard lizard. Nice construction...Summer days we open a window and he gets sun and fresh air. I did buy a tray to go under it to catch the substrate/bedding that is kicked out.
customer_reviews.author: avalon

product_meta.title: Zoo Med ReptiBreeze Open Air Screen Cage, Small, 16 x 16 x 20-Inches
product_meta.description: Open air aluminum screen cage. Great for small species of Old World Chameleons, Juvenile Green Iguanas and other arboreal species of lizards, such as Geckos, Anoles, etc. Large front door for easy cage access and bottom door for easy substrate removal. Beautiful corrosion-resistant black anodized aluminum screen cage.
feature_bullets: easy to assemble using only a screw driver

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
